thread.title: Margaret L. Garvin
thread.title_full: Colorado Pen reviewed by Margaret L. Garvin

author: Margaret L. Garvin
title: Margaret L. Garvin
text: I have been a customer of Colorado Pen for a few years. I recently placed an order for rollerball refills for my Parker Pen and as always am so amazed how quickly they were shipped. I had previously lived in NM but have moved to the east coast since my last order so wondered if the service would be as quick. It was and I especially love supporting a small business committed to excellent service and products.
